title: can yall explain to me why dark harvest is overused.
body:
Yeah its a good rune.
yeah its easy to proc.
but why the fuck is a leona support taking it.
you don't even do damage.
W H Y.

replies.body:
Because she is an all in support? If she lands the E, she is going in and can't disengage except for blowing Q and maybe R.

DH will let her do damage without having to build it.
She has a Really hard time procing it herself, Aftershock is much more reliable damage.
Because it's broken and pretty much everyone jumps on the bandwagon when something gets broken. Damn Twitch. At least _my_ fans still know how to play without Flash and Dark Harvest. :) So proud.

>you don't even do damage.

she does a pretty good amount of damage actually. Especially with a dark harvest proc.

> [{quoted}](name=breakordoom444,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fI0wrQpf,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-12-04T06:08:41.366+0000)
>
> Yeah its a good rune.
> yeah its easy to proc.
> but why the fuck is a leona support taking it.
> you don&#039;t even do damage.
> W H Y.

Leona may not do much damage, but dark harvest does.
